body.name: Vesgantti 2 Seater Sofa, 68 inch Fabric Couches for Living Room, Mid Century Modern Loveseat Sofas w/Armrest, Button Tufted Seat Cushion, Modern Couch for Bedroom, Apartment, Office, Beige
features: ⭐Modern Design⭐ Squared armrest and polyester fabric construction delivers a clean simple look. Detail pillows bring a little personality.
⭐Practical Living⭐ Fit 2-3 people, compact & comfortably. Stain-resistant linen polyester fabric. Raised 7.87" for easy floor-cleaning.
⭐Compact Size⭐ Dimension: 67.91 X 33.07 X 30.31 Inches; Fits for small spaces, dorm, apartment, studio, etc
⭐Easy Assembly⭐ Require partial assembly, all accessories have been packed in the box; If some parts are missing, please contact with us in time.
⭐Choose Your Vibe⭐ Available in beige, grey, blue, pink, you can pick the right color for your unique style.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Modern Sofas for Your Business The modern style is a great balance of professional and relaxed, making furniture in this design appropriate for many different business types. From its clean lines and quality design to the soft, durable fabric, you can't go wrong with a modern couch from us.

CONTEMPORARY STYLE TRACK ARMS: With a contemporary edge, track arm sofas keep your style sleek. They're also great space-savers, taking up less room and making it easier for you to arrange your furniture layout. TUFTED: Stitched or buttoned, tufting creates a timeless pattern. Go for the pulled look of tufted fabric for a perfect touch of depth and detail. SMALL SPACE: Sleek in shape, this design blends perfectly into small spaces. Smaller designs mean more styling possibilities – more ways to arrange, place and accessorize without having to worry about size or fit.
The polyester fabric is smooth to the touch, making this a comfortable piece to lounge and relax on.
It provides firmer support for everyday lounging. On a scale from 1 to 5 (5 being firmest), it's a 4.
Solid wood legs and framework offer a smooth appearance and durable support.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: So excited getting the two seater sofa for my home, just moved (new home, new everything). The color beige of the couch matches the brick-shaped walls of the room and the size is perfect because of the small space of my living room. I’m very glad that my package arrived in a hard and thick box because it did not come with styrofoam, but it came tightly closed with plastic film inside the box. Luckily, I opened it carefully. The sofa is kind of heavy. So I really needed my partner help to assemble it because I’m not physically strong. It was easy to put it together since all the pieces are organized by letters and numbers. Detailed instructions are included with drawings of all parts of the sofa and also show how to install each screw. Oh, the tools are included too, so I did not worry about using my own. The sofa is beautiful and can easily sit on it three or four people. What I like most is that when I sit down I feel comfort and stability (it doesn’t feel like it’s going to fall apart). Everyone at home loves it!!!! The sofa arrived in the best season. I can’t wait to start decorating for Christmas! Happy purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I like it, great sofa for the price
reviews.reviewText: It's well designed for what it is, steady and solid. Complaints seem to be materials for the frame, but I don't plan on jumping up and down on it. I'm 235 lbs, 6ft tall and it's supports me well, no sagging or creaking noises. Perfect for watching TV. If you live with you butt, stuck on a couch all day not for you. If you just want sitting place for a guest or somewhere to sit with your other and watch TV for a few hours, this works great and at a low price. Beats out a futon, for comfort and price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Okay for the price, needs better back support pillows
reviews.reviewText: Easy to put together, bottom cushions are very firm. The back support pillows are lacking any support. Way too soft in my opinion.Sturdy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Hard as stone!
reviews.reviewText: Very different in-person compared to what you see in the pictures. Feels like you are sitting on a toy sofa, and is extremely hard to sit on, somehow feels harder than a bench, no softness/cushion at all.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Update: good customer service - thank you
reviews.reviewText: Final update:Seller was very responsive about fixing the issues and asked what my preference was for solving it. Once that was decided they were very quick in sending me a new couch. Assembled the new one today and it works great, no issues. I love the color and the style and it fits great in my apartment. A little firm but in a good way for my dog and I. The back cushions could be fluffier but on the whole it gets the job done.1st update:Seller has been very positive and quick with their responses for resolution. I believe that we have a solution in place that should satisfy the issue. When the action steps are completed I will update again with a new star rating. The couch itself seems comfy and cozy and I will speak more about that when/if resolution has been met.Original review:Will update if manufacturer is responsive in fixing the issue of the broken part. Hoping they will send a replacement part (the main couch cushion) or a whole new couch. The issue: the zipper that connects the front and back of the couch that fills the gap and provides a space for the pillows to sit broke. Which makes the couch unusable because the back pillows have nowhere to sit. It also came with a small stain, which I’m not that concerned about. Just want the couch to function.. If they fix the issue, I’ll let you know. ——- update - problem fixed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Quality of Assembly
reviews.reviewText: There is no support for about 6 inches at the back of the seat area. It is just material zippered together with the pillows sitting on it. The seat is not as thick as expected, nor are the pillows or back cushions. It was only $200 and will be moved into the art room in a few months, when we get a better one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice and sturdy
reviews.reviewText: Very cute couch, and good size for bedroom. Had some trouble finding a pink couch that’s affordable, cute, and sturdy, but this one turned out to be all three :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice for the money.
reviews.reviewText: Easy to put together. Quick delivery. 1 boot wouldn't screw in all the way but was still able to complete the set up. It's a nice sofa for the price. Bottom cushions are very very firm. We won't be sitting on it much. It's for my son's game room so friends can have a place to sit.I would not buy again but then again you get what you pay for. Still giving 5 stars.
